sentences.en: ...a one-time rebel who had rediscovered his faith.
sentences.cn: ...重新发现了自己信仰的一个曾经的反叛者。

sentences.en: And now we may stop, look inward and rediscover the amber warmth of family and conversation.
sentences.cn: 现在我们也许应该驻足, 审视内心,重新感受亲人团聚的温馨.

sentences.en: He has to rediscover that quality.
sentences.cn: 他现在需要找回那个状态.

sentences.en: Let's rediscover life in the slow lane.
sentences.cn: 让我们在慢车道上去重新发现生活吧.

sentences.en: Make new friends; rediscover old ones; tell them that you love them; and when you love them; feel it deeply.
sentences.cn: 结交新朋友; 重新认识旧朋友; 让他们知道你爱他们; 对他们的爱; 是何等的真切.

sentences.en: Not doing so you turn back into yourself, only to rediscover things you already know.
sentences.cn: 不这样做你会回到自身, 只是重新发现那些你已知道的东西.

sentences.en: Or get playful. Tickle, laugh, be silly. Rediscover the playmate in your partner.
sentences.cn: 开玩笑, 呵痒, 大笑, 装傻. 重新地去发现在你们之间的新的玩伴.

sentences.en: Rediscover a part of yourself that has lain dormant for years or decades.
sentences.cn: 重新发觉在你身上沉睡已久(多年活着数十年)的另一面.

sentences.en: Scientists are now trying to rediscover if this is possible.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正在探索这是否可能.

sentences.en: So venture out of comfort zone now and again, and rediscover how good discomfort can feel.
sentences.cn: 所以,时不时地跳出舒适的领域, 重新去发现不适的感觉其实是多么美好.

sentences.en: The drop - down menu lets him rediscover functions whose names he's forgotten.
sentences.cn: 下拉菜单可以让他重新发现自己已经忘记名字的功能.

sentences.en: The French seemed to rediscover an obsessive interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 法国民众似乎重新找到了对政治痴迷的兴趣.

sentences.en: This not only enables you to avoid potential pitfalls, you rediscover your zest for life.
sentences.cn: 这样不止能够帮助你避开可能的陷阱, 你也会再次发现生活的趣味.

sentences.en: Your love has helped me to rediscover myself. Your love is an effecticve antidote to despair.
sentences.cn: 你的爱让我重新找回来了我自己. 你的爱是治疗绝望的灵丹妙药.

sentences.en: Your love has helped me to rediscover myself. Your love is an effective antidote to despair.
sentences.cn: 你的爱让我重新找回了我自己. 你的爱是治疗绝望的灵丹妙药.

trans.tran_en: If you rediscover something good or valuable that you had forgotten or lost, you become aware of it again or find it again
If you rediscover something good or valuable that you had forgotten or lost, you become aware of it again or find it again
